biography.placeOfBirth: Ardatov, Mordovian AO, RSFSR, USSR [now Mordovia, Russia]
biography.bio: Iya Arepina was born on June 2, 1930 in Ardatov, Mordovian AO, RSFSR, USSR as Iya Alexeyevna Arepina. She was an actress, known for Kapitanskaya dochka (1958), Pod stuk kolyos (1959) and Une grande famille (1954). She was married to Vadim Milstein and Yuli Kun. She died on July 24, 2003 in Moscow, Russia.
biography.name: Iya Arepina

biography.placeOfBirth: Livny, Livny uyezd, Oryol Governorate, Russian Empire [now Oryol Oblast, Russia]
biography.bio: Sergei Romodanov was born on August 12, 1899 in Livny, Livny uyezd, Oryol Governorate, Russian Empire as Sergey Dmitrievich Romodanov. He was an actor, known for Devotion (1954), Delo Artamonovykh (1941) and Pervyy eshelon (1956). He died on September 23, 1975 in Yaroslavl, Yaroslavl Oblast, RSFSR, USSR.
biography.name: Sergei Romodanov

biography.placeOfBirth: Kobelyaki, Poltava Governorate, Russian Empire [now Poltava Oblast, Ukraine]
biography.bio: Stepan Shkurat was born on January 8, 1886 in Kobelyaki, Poltava Governorate, Russian Empire as Stepan Iosifovich Shkurat. He was an actor, known for La terre (1930), Vij (1967) and Chapayev (1934). He died on February 26, 1973 in Romny, Sumy Oblast, Ukranian SSR, USSR [now Ukraine].
biography.name: Stepan Shkurat

biography.placeOfBirth: Novocherkassk, Don Voisko Oblast, Russian Empire [now Rostov Oblast, Russia]
biography.bio: Valentina Telegina was born on February 15, 1915 in Novocherkassk, Don Voisko Oblast, Russian Empire as Valentina Petrovna Telegina. She was an actress, known for Ballad of a Soldier (1959), Dom, v kotorom ya zhivu (1957) and Three Poplars at Plyuschikha Street (1968). She died on October 4, 1979 in Moscow, RSFSR, USSR.
biography.name: Valentina Telegina
